casebody.data:
No. 137,

Original.

State of Montana, Plaintiff v. State of Wyoming and State of North Dakota. 562 U.S. 979, 131 S. Ct. 442,

178 L. Ed. 2d 319,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8187. October 18, 2010.

Montana’s motion for partial summary judgment granted in part and denied in part without prejudice in accordance with the Special Master’s First Interim Report, and Anadarko Petroleum’s motion for leave to intervene denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this motion.
